title: Upper Yoke - Installation

body.body: Refit the upper yoke. Ensure the headlight bracket and mounting rubbers are between the upper and lower yoke.
Fit and tighten the top nut to
Tighten the upper yoke pinch bolts to
Locate the handlebars on to the risers, fit the clamp and the fixings. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Rotate the handlebars so that the centre of the alignment mark on the handlebar aligns with the split line of the left hand riser.
Tighten the handlebar clamp fixings, front ones first, to
Refit the instruments and bracket assembly to the upper yoke. Tighten the new fixings to
Route the ignition switch harness and connect it to the main harness as noted for removal.
Refit the headlight subframes, headlight bracket and headlight (see

Move the handlebars to the left and right full lock while checking that cables and harnesses do not bind or that the steering feels tight or difficult to turn. A cable or harness that binds, or steering that is tight/difficult to turn will restrict the steering and may cause loss of motorcycle control and an accident.

body.body: Check the headlight operation and the beam setting, rectify as necessary.
